prompt:
I have the following count table for an RNA-seq experiment, rows are genes and columns are samples,"Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx". The first column of the file is my gene names and the rest of the columns are samples. My annotation data is here "SRP021193.colData.tsv", it contains sample annotations and rows of this matches the columns of count table, first column is the sample ids. Normalize counts, make two PCA plots for samples, one color coded samples by "group" and the other color coded by "LibrarySelection" in my annotation data.

response:
```
# Load necessary libraries
library(DESeq2)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
library(reshape2)

# Read count table
count_table <- read_excel("Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx")

# Read annotation data
annotation_data <- read.table("SRP021193.colData.tsv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# Rename columns in count table
colnames(count_table) <- c("Gene", colnames(count_table)[2:length(count_table)])

# Calculate size factors
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = count_table[, -1], colData = annotation_data, design = ~1)
dds <- estimateSizeFactors(dds)

# Normalize counts
normalized_counts <- counts(dds, normalized = TRUE)

# Create the first PCA plot with color coded samples by "group"
pca_data_1 <- prcomp(t(normalized_counts))
plot_data_1 <- data.frame(PC1 = pca_data_1$x[, 1], PC2 = pca_data_1$x[, 2], Group = annotation_data$group)
plot_1 <- ggplot(plot_data_1, aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = Group)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "PCA Plot (Color coded by Group)")

# Create the second PCA plot with color coded samples by "LibrarySelection"
plot_data_2 <- data.frame(PC1 = pca_data_1$x[, 1], PC2 = pca_data_1$x[, 2], LibrarySelection = annotation_data$LibrarySelection)
plot_2 <- ggplot(plot_data_2, aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = LibrarySelection)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "PCA Plot (Color coded by LibrarySelection)")

# Display the PCA plots
plot_1
plot_2
```

Note: Please make sure to install the required libraries before running the code.
